assets.description: This spot was directed and designed by Juan Delcan and edited by Ed Einhorn with all creative execution done by the Click3x team.
assets.title: Ed Einhorn Editor

assets.description: James Franco shows off his superb multitasking skills in this spot for the Samsung Galaxy Note. We edited and composited this spot.
assets.title: Ed Einhorn Editor

assets.description: Throughout his career as an editor in NYC, Ed has been fortunate to work with an amazing roaster of talent including Droga5, MediaCom, Journey, academy-award nominated director Brett Morgen and on a variety of projects from theatrical trailers to music videos.  When he's not perfecting a narrative, Ed lives in Williamsburg, Brooklyn. He loves riding his fixed gear bicycle and hanging with his family. Ed enjoys working with new clients and the challenge of helping them tell their story in stylized and creative methodology.
assets.title: Ed Einhorn Editor
